Straightshot goes right up to Elita and rubs her head reassuringly.

" Ther=
e's an un identified intruder lurking in the Ark.  But I'm sure the guys ar=
e gonna be able ta stop them before they get too far.  I suspect they could=
 be wanting something formidable but not sure what it is they want or who i=
t is that's infiltrated the ship.  But don't worry, I'll stay here and guar=
d you guys.  Any creep that tries ta come through here is gonna get a face =
full of quills."

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using tradi=
tional and digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great =
for any occasion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem! =
 Email me at this address and we will talk.
